4 Days

Kyoto Cultural Immersion

A deep dive into Kyoto's traditional culture, from ancient temples to modern LGBTQ+ friendly experiences.

※ This is a sample tour. Please contact us for detailed information and customization options.

Overview

Immerse yourself in the heart of traditional Japan with this comprehensive Kyoto tour. Explore hidden temples, participate in authentic cultural experiences, and discover LGBTQ+ friendly venues in this ancient capital. Perfect for those seeking a deeper understanding of Japanese culture while feeling safe and welcomed.

Gallery

Sample Schedule

Day 1 - 09:00
Arrival and traditional ryokan check-in
Day 1 - 14:00
Fushimi Inari Shrine exploration
Day 1 - 18:00
Traditional kaiseki dinner
Day 2 - 09:00
Kiyomizu-dera and Gion district tour
Day 2 - 14:00
Tea ceremony and kimono experience
Day 2 - 19:00
LGBTQ+ friendly local bar visit
Day 3 - 09:00
Arashiyama bamboo forest and monkey park
Day 3 - 14:00
Traditional craft workshop
Day 4 - 10:00
Departure

Locations & Sample Experiences

Historic Temples & Shrines

Kyoto's most sacred and beautiful religious sites

  • Private tours of Fushimi Inari, Kiyomizu-dera, and more
  • Spiritual and cultural insights from LGBTQ+ friendly guides
  • Photography sessions at iconic locations

Traditional Experiences

Authentic Japanese cultural activities

  • Tea ceremony with LGBTQ+ friendly instructors
  • Kimono rental and styling
  • Traditional craft workshops (pottery, calligraphy)

Gion & Local Culture

Kyoto's famous geisha district and local LGBTQ+ community

  • Gion district walking tour
  • LGBTQ+ friendly local venues
  • Traditional and modern dining experiences

Inquiry

For more information about this tour or to make a reservation, please contact us. We'll be happy to customize the itinerary to match your preferences and needs.
